post.body: Yeah. They've "fxied the problem" they said, but it can be difficult to verify (it's about web hosting).
Yes I think Analytics integration is much superior than AdSense channels. We'll see -- have to wait until the propagation kicks in.
Just activated it. Might have to wait for a while before the data gets sync'ed.
Just unpack the tarball, edit the ini file, and run twitterbot.py. Send "help" to bot for the commands. Poll Twitter every 5 min
Require pyxml. Works w/ only 1 single user. Edit twitterbot.ini. http://h77p.com/1M
Any idea how much E63 is going to cost in Australia? Cheaper than Agora Pro?
and which referral gives the best eCPM/earning. Visitors from Whirlpool have VERY lousy CTR and eCPM...
Good. Although a bit laggy in stats. Need a week of data before making real sense. Give good info on which page makes the most.
Nice find. Checking out some of the .au sites with inurl:.au/plesk-stat/webstat
I don't think it will matter much. I had it between pos 2-4 for a long time. I think it's just musical chair - my turn this time.
Sorry but after my last tweet, I think this kind of stuff should have been better to be kept to myself...
Guess where I found my email from AdSense team? :) Thanks for reminding me to look in my spam box
Wow. Didn't have time to go there when I went to HK back in October.
Home time! More work to do at home. Also gotta prepare for 1 Timothy bible study for tomorrow evening.
Having real difficulty to keep PHP-FastCGI from dying. Don't want to upgrade either to Ubuntu 8.10. A bit risky.
Nice free shuffle bus in Sydney CBD. I can now go to China Town for lunch and back to Martin Place for free. http://h77p.com/1Q
I wish more ppl are using Gmail rather than Hotmail. Not bcoz G is better, but Live just has this draconian sender policy no1 understands
Converting a box of 30 sites from lightty to nginx tonight. My last lighty box... Nginx ftw!
What to do when a company, that you wrote negative about their product before, wants to advertise on your site (+ "fixing up" old report)?
Yeah! Finally got my invite to integrate AdSense with Analytics.
Replied one email. 13 more show up in inbox. Argh!
Petrol has dropped below $1/litre at my closest shell station. http://h77p.com/1P
Anyone knows the Niche Media guys? (niche.com.au) Been spamming my site pretending to be customers.
Darn. PennyTel Mobile App does not work on my phone. Not their fault of couse. My phone is really on the dodgy side.
Loading PennyTel's website requires a good discipline of patience... ARGH!!!!
Interest rate has dropped below the rate when I bought my place back in 2003... It must be sucky to be on fixed right now.
Amazon Simple DB is now free for 25 machine hours and 1GB storage. I think my next app will be using one! http://h77p.com/1O
Wishlist.com.au EPIC FAIL. http://h77p.com/1N
Argh! Can't keep the PHP fastcgi server up!! PHP-CGI would just die on me for no reason, doing less than 5req/sec...
http://h77p.com/1U
The office next door has always been "noisy" on Fridays. We are TRYING TO WORK HERE!
Python 3.0 final release. http://h77p.com/1R
One annoyance about IE8 is all iexplore processes share the same session cookiebin. I used to be able to log in as 2 diff acc w/ IE6/IE7
Wow. Did I just see Google Readers sporting a new interface, similar to the recent Gmail facelift?
Kogan agora or Nokia E71... Which one? Need (Actually want) a new phone soon.
Being a Satch fan, I still cannot work out the similarity between If I Could Fly (Is There Love In Space) and Viva la Vida by Cold Play.
What's up with all the helicopters in the city? Can't concentrate at work!
Rent or buy? Oops I meant cloud or co-loc your own servers? Interesting post from GvR. http://h77p.com/1V
Werid. netstat -p does not want to show the program name on Ubuntu 8.10 under OpenVZ/Linux 2.6.18, even when I am root.
Upgrading one box to intrepid server...
DVI connection to my 2nd monitor borked. Now on D-Sub. Everything seems to be blurry...
How I hate the fact that I cannot switch programs from a java app on the 3skypephone.
Thanks to Jason for helping out transporting this queen size bed from Alan's place, all on my old pulsar. http://h77p.com/1W
EzyDVD 48 hour sale. Their server is getting reallllllly slow :( http://www.ezydvd.com.au/beatthebomb.zml
Bus is moving so slow on ANZAC parade the chance of getting home before kids go to sleep has become futile.
On the bus trying to delete spams on ozbargain. Lucky that I did a mobile version of the site...
Looks like Google AdSense for domain also works on 404 pages. Gotta park all mine on them. Bwhahahaha!!! Wait, not enabled on mine yet...
Building a new kernel. Haven't done so since 2.6.22. I am a slacker...
Finally got SERP #1 for my most desirable keyword on Google AU. Bwahahahah!!! Not sure how long will it last.
A vendor changed the XML schema without telling us, again :(
WordPress upgrade completed. Nice 2.7 UI :) None of my plugins seems to break. Not yet...
svn switch my WordPress blog to tag/2.7 !!
Apparently A$2 CPM for a banner and A$3.50 CPM for a 300x250 rectangle in prominent placement is not cheap enough for some advertisers...
Out of office and heading back home. Merry CHRISTmas!
Server rebooted. Had a kernel bug (2.6.26-gentoo-r4) that even sudo reboot won't work. Had to call wife to power cycle it.
Had a nice traffic-less bus ride into the city though this morning. 9 Ways Kingsford to Martin Place in CBD = 15 minutes
Home sevrer is really dead. Need a reboot.
Last day of work this year for me. Yeah!
Had laksa for lunch at Xin Ma with wife and kids. http://h77p.com/1a
Going to lunch with the kids in the city.
Just posted on HostingFu - Hard Drive Crashes -- Are You Prepared? In response to TPN's server crash. http://h77p.com/1Z
Good morning Twitter! Three more days of work this year!
got my very first christmas gift this year... From microsoft! Thanks Deeps! http://h77p.com/1Y
Hate the advertisers who on;y want to spend $50, got lots of questions, and always complained that his ads is not showing.
Playing around with the new VPS & Webbynode Manager @webbynode. Cool bananas!
Received my DVDs from EzyDVD. http://h77p.com/1X
Last guy got onto the express bus. Count myself lucky today.
When is Debian Lenny going to be out?! Need a Debian-based running PHP5.2.6+, but don't want Ubuntu 8.10...
Someone just FAXED in a PRINT OUT of the screen dump to our support guys. Wonderful technology, isn't it?
Got on an express bus to city, and it's surprisingly empty. CBD crisis in Sydney?
Add "-nomerge" to iexplorer.exe if you don't want each process to share the session cookies in IE8.
